website_summaries.verdict: A good pallet buster to consider when you need something gentle on pallet wood.
pros: Takes just minutes to disassemble a pallet
Comes with an articulating head for the best busting results
Large handle makes it easy to apply different levels of pressure when disassembling pallets
cons: Too big to fit in between the spaces of some smaller pallet slats

customer_reviews.title: This is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up at the PO yesterday. I've been collected a stack of pallets for a few months.. Every once in a while I would go out and get the pry bar, crow bar, and hammer, and break a few up at a time. On average would take about 15 minutes to disassemble one. Couldn't wait to try this tool.. Went out, tossed the first one flat on the ground, and applied the breaker. 2 minutes later.. It was apart! Can't believe in the 4 years I've been making stuff out of upcycled pallets I never came across this tool before!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: Great pallet breaker
customer_reviews.text: The articulating heads are very important. Pallets are very fickle because the individual boards behave differently as they are being pried off. Since I'm using this to reclaim wood for other uses, having the articulating heads helps prevent the boards from being rolled in the direction of the pull thus making it much less likely they will split or break along the length of the board. This is huge, because it probably increases your recovery of usable boards by 75% or more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hish

customer_reviews.title: Perfromed as promised
customer_reviews.text: Am finally able to take pallets apart without destroying the wood! My 1st pallet I used this tool on was a 1" thick very heavy oak pallet. It took a little effort but got it apart in faster time time than it would.have if I'd used my prybar and hammer. Next pallet was pine and it was a breeze to take apart. This is a very well made heavy duty time-saving tool with much less damage to wood and am glad I found this on Amazon and for a reasonable price too! The only disappointment I have is I never received the prybar that was supposed to come with this. You'll be glad you bought this tool!
customer_reviews.author: L A White

customer_reviews.title: Great tool! Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been dismantling pallets for a while, till now there is no easy way. Tore down 10 pallets in under an hour. This thing works great! For the price I thought would be light not made well. Wrong, Heavy duty! It is heavy but I think is a good thing. Will give you a good workout and get the job done! 💪 Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A Breeze To Use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I feel silly having waited so long to get one. Hammer and crowbar pallet breaking is hard work. I broke down 3 pallets in about 15 minutes (no broke boards and all nails removed) using the pallet buster. Best part was I could do it one handed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be scared by the fake company name that plagues Amazon these days; it works great
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated because it's tough to buy a MOJIMOOOOUMMIGOGOMMIII product and feel confident it will work or last or do anything but deplete your bank account. But this one actually works. I pulled three pallets apart, screw nails and all, in a few minutes in the garage the other day. You destroy so many less boards using one of these. The leverage is great, because the bottom hangs and adjusts to where you put it. Hard to describe, but you'll see. This saves you from wrenching your body and from flying shrapnel. Voice of experience.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Built like a Sherman Tank.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new toy/tool. When I was using a hammer and a pry bar it took me a good 20 to 30 minutes to dismantle a sturdy pallet. With this tool I am averaging 5 to 8 minutes for the same type pallets. I don't think there is any possibility of bending or breaking this tool. My only complaint (and it's a small one) is that the tool weighs a ton. By the way, don't take the free nail puller into account when you are deciding. The nail puller is a piece of junk. But the pallet buster is worth every penny I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: C E. Grif

customer_reviews.title: Heavy well built tool
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes get Canadian hard wood pallets and those bad Larry's are locked together with some weird screw-nails that simply do not budge. After spending a few hours of my precious free time banging on them with a 3lb sledge and a crowbar, I did some research and found this tool to make my life easier. After the poor UPS guy lugged it to my steps, I immediately opened it and started ripping through previously indestructible pallets. Its solid, welds are strong and I have no fear of throwing my entire body weight on this thing. Siding my barn with pallet wood is now looking like a real possibility.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with it- saved lots of time
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to. The dual arms are great and because they move it’s less likely that you’ll break the wood. If you’re breaking wood with this thing, you may be using it wrong. Cut the outer sides of the pallet, and use this to break the inner- you don’t lose much wood and it’s way easier. I am salvaging wood for reuse and it’s a lot easier than a pry bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse McCandless

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for removing deck boards.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove the top deck boards from 2 of my decks. I removed the boards from one of the decks and it worked great. I guess I'm one of the few that didn't buy it to break down pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in TN

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok but I had to return it because it wouldn't fit in between pallet boards. The product has a swivel base which would interfere with proper alignment to lift up nailed boards. Returning it was another issue. They offered me a 20.00 refund to keep it and I declined. Worst part about this is time it took for a return label and it's been almost a week and still no refund. Dont buy from this seller, you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great pallet too for use on Pinterest pallet projects
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little cheaper but works very good when taking apart pallets without breaking the boards. Of course cheaper route is to use a Sawzall to cut between the boards to get the nails. This is deff worth the purchase if you are doing pallet projects you find on Pinterest.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Need lumber? Call big blue!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, strong and will do the job! It takes a little time to learn how to not kick your own ass with this tool. Once you figure out a smoother plan of attack (all pallets are not the same) you won't leave as many nails in the beams or broken planks. You can definitely dismantle some pallets quick with it.
customer_reviews.author: William R Barber

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: From my wheel chair I can only watch as my brother used this tool to rip up my wooden deck to replace it, once he had the first 2x6 pulled up, the rest just popped up over the rusted nail heads of twenty years. Made a long project simple, had a new deck/porch in one day.
customer_reviews.author: old shopper

customer_reviews.title: The pallet buster is awesome, the nail puller isn't
customer_reviews.text: The nail puller went directly into the scrap metal pile, what a piece of junk. The pallet buster tool is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Len Pope

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting it to not be as good as it was rated. I'm a pretty big guy and I rip pallets apart with a prybar normally but this thing is ridiculous. It speeds up the process so much and preserves the wood nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many ways to pull pallets apart. Some were more labor-intensive than others. This is great! I can completely pull apart a pallet in about 5 minutes with this. And that is saving as much of the wood as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Did not work very well for us
customer_reviews.text: On the different pallets we tried this on all it did was bust the boards where they were unusable. We find it easier using sawzall to cut the nails and end up with cleaner boards.
customer_reviews.author: Vykon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at pallet busting!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I went with the 44" handle because I'm tall, and it works out well. This pallet buster really works as advertised, I broke down a pallet in a few minutes, then pulled all the nails. It was great! On smaller boards, it will break ends off, but I trim off the ends of my boards anyway, so not a deal breaker. Very happy with this product and would recommend for any pallet recycling.
customer_reviews.author: warwizard99

customer_reviews.title: Work horse tool.
customer_reviews.text: We had a big pile of rotten pallets to dismantle and burn. The tool is a great time saver. Needs one person to use the tool while someone helps to hold down a pallet. Standing on one end allows easing dismantling of the boards. Awesomely designed to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: lbartist

customer_reviews.title: A must if you are reusing pallets!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! If I would have known how easy this tool would make taking pallets apart I would have ordered it along time ago! With this tool, you can have a pallet taken apart in 3 minutes without breaking the boards and without any effort! I am amazed!
customer_reviews.author: J Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Quality investment
customer_reviews.text: If you use pallet wood for your projects like I do, this product is WELL worth the time/money. Makes the process 3x as fast without too much effort. It's still a workout but it no longer breaks my back/shoulders. Best decision to buy this!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Holly

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: I would give ease of use 5 stars. But the bulky head sometimes is a Bword to get in between slats, and id i have to start from the ends or on and off set slat theres nothing for it to grab onto. But all and all works pretty damn good, and alot easier than hammering or cutting
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty - Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and heavy duty, too. Tried it out on an oak pallet and it worked just fine. Be advised that you WILL need to apply some force. Your biggest problem is likely to be how to hold down the pallet while you rip it apart. No matter what tool you use, and what pallet, not all boards will be salvageable. All in all, a very heavy-duty tool that does the job. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Not the best way to break up a pallet.
customer_reviews.text: This a complete waste of money regardless of why you’re breaking up the pallet. If you’re wanting to salvage any of the boards you’d do better to go to Menards and buy a $30 reciprocating saw. Cheaper and faster. You’ll probably only get 1 maybe 2 complete boards using this pallet buster. On a positive note it’s well built, makes for a good sledgehammer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after first few pallets. Where the forks weld to the shaft just sheared off and broke. Contacted seller. We'll see how it goes. Update: Seller made it right. So all is well, but quality remains an issue.
customer_reviews.author: 2401MrsT

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy but amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use. Very durable!! Will definitely last a lifetime and worth the money. Its heavier than i thought it would but i wasnt surprised because its sturdy and meant for heavy duty projects. I took several pallets apart in no time. Saved me a lot of time. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver, Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: If you work with pallets, you need this Pallet Buster. Easy to use. What took 20 minutes now takes 5 minutes. With a little patcience and practice you will be all to remove the boards without splitting. Not too heavy. I would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: A good pallet puller to take them apart and use the wood for projects.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and what my hubby wanted. Need to watch the youtube video to figure out how to use it though.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: STRONK
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! It absolutely rips apart pallets with almost not damage to the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miskell

customer_reviews.title: Big and strong!
customer_reviews.text: It a big pry bar and it works well. Good leverage. Not much more I can say about it. Nice tool.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cade

customer_reviews.title: Strong build, Great Leverage!
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great! Heavy Duty, superior leverage, and pivoting shoes/feet so the tool will not dig into the wood you’re prying off.
customer_reviews.author: Dimetri

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: still will have some splitting on the ends so may have to just saw ends off. works great in center of slat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for those without the means to make their own
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handle pipe were a thicker schedule, otherwise, the tool does exactly what it's made for. If, like me, you break down hundreds of pallets a year, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy Screen

customer_reviews.title: Works great..with one exception
customer_reviews.text: The forks are big and will not fit in between pallets that have runners that are close together.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: What an incredibly clever tool. Works like a charm. It takes a little finagiling and cleverness per pallet because they can be very different but once you squeeze it place the slats pop right up clean. Way better than using sawzalls and hammers!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money to me!
customer_reviews.text: It’s made very well, separates pallets great. Smaller pallets you do have to remove first board to get it going. Craftsmanship is excellent! Free nail puller performed well too!
customer_reviews.author: Greg McKee

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I never give 5 stars but this piece of equipment does everything it is advertised to do. Most of this equipment is built cheaply but this is the only time I would say something is over built. I am very hard on tools and this can survive me.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: It bust my pallets within minutes. It was very sturdy, and easy to use. The boards came up like butter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cash Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little getting used to but this tool is awesome! Helps to get palette apart without damaging boards
customer_reviews.author: A. manuelian

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Broke apart 2 pallets in less than 10 minutes. And I'm a girl.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: saving sawsall blades
customer_reviews.text: works well for not having to saw pallets into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this and loves it. Makes deconstructing pallets a lot easier and prevents the boards from breaking during removal.
customer_reviews.author: Abianna

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: I just trough it in the garbage, thought is was a good idea, not
customer_reviews.author: V Griff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Breaks them pallets like crazy without tearing up the wood you're attempting to salvage! Now if it would only control the weather so I don't sweat so much using it!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Will work on single and double 2x joists
customer_reviews.text: Wide enough to straddle a 3.5”wide board and strong enough to pull out 2 screws simultaneously. Took 2x6 deck boards off without breaking them. Will be taking 5/4x6 boards off in couple weeks and I feel it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pivots... allows full contact with board
customer_reviews.text: Others have fixed pry area and will not have full contact... I really like this feature and feel it helps to reduce splitting.
customer_reviews.author: David Caylor

customer_reviews.title: Does the job it is meant for!
customer_reviews.text: Just tore apart a bunch of over sized pallets and turned them into some wood for some projects!!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Judge    Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Way easier then a pry bar. Have a Great Day.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't split the wood!
customer_reviews.text: The thing works! Doesn't take much effort, doesn't split the wood, well worth the price! Works far better than others! Nail remover that came with it is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ederati

customer_reviews.title: This tool works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: We have broken down a few pallets so far and this tool works great. It is well built and makes easy work of both ring shank nailed pallets and also stapled pallets. Don't hesitate to purchase if you are looking for this kind of tool. Very little if any damage to the wood slats.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tracy - Smokin Signs & Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: Much easier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping boards from splitting and pulling 1” boards off pallets. Getting use to it.
customer_reviews.author: gotcha

customer_reviews.title: Use both hands and gloves whenever you are using it for breaking down any job.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a farmer so I pick up pallets and used it for breaking them down to use in building my chicken coops. A lot easier than hammer and crowbar.
customer_reviews.author: Loran Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Part 1
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the other design and brand I had ordered. Easy to use and rugged!! Busted up a new hardwood pallet with little effort. One pallet down 99 more to go. After several more pallets I'll continue w/ Part 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool👍
customer_reviews.text: The pallet buster is heavy but it does remove the wood without damage at about 98%. Great tool. Recommend a 3 star only because of weight but if making small project with pallets this tool is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: jjp

customer_reviews.title: Great pallet tool
customer_reviews.text: one hell of a great tool for making quick work out of pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J savage

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: Found that when pulling the end of the board it splits the bottlom of the board where the mails are located. Pulls board very easy.

customer_reviews.title: would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: I absolutely love this tool, it's a time saver, I've broken down approx 15 pallets an it's still sturdy an strong. Con: pry bar that comes with is junk!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought it sooner! Save me from a body ache and cut the pallet disassemble time in half.
customer_reviews.author: Sopha Touch

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to use, and comes with the nail puller -- best value on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pallet buster I've ever used. I'm a woman in my 60's and was able to bust a pallet in less than 15 minutes, and that's including pulling the nails!!
customer_reviews.author: crafty919

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! It makes dismantling pallets so quickly!

customer_reviews.title: Great labor saver
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing (and saving) deck boards. Turned days or work into hours of less hard work.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: The product was everything they said it was. Haven't used it yet but looks to be a good quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use. Makes dismantling pallets easy and quick. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I made it so much easier to break apart pallets. I no longer have to ask my husband for help.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tool! As long as you know how to use it, you will really like it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16yo who was making a pallet project for his grandfather for Christmas. It is amazing! Built well and very sturdy. With this tool it only takes about 5 mins to take apart a pallet and we didn’t have any split boards. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and makes pallet projects so easy
customer_reviews.text: Separating pallets and it made so easy I took so many apart my boss at work said to use it at work

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, going to be a great help in getting skid wood for my 10x20 man cave

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pallet Board Remover!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to disassemble some pallets for a Garden Fence DIY project. Easy to use and it's made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This tool is the perfect tool to disassemble pallets without destroying all the wood.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. The price was great as well.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these only needed one. Good product in box never been used.

customer_reviews.title: Pallet breaker
customer_reviews.text: Wished I had gotten this when I first started breaking down about 100 pallets

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: The tooths are kind of fat for inserting them into the pallets to pry the boards up!

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Super strong high quality tool .makes it easy on your back ...product is great

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: If you're working with pallets this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Pallet ripper
customer_reviews.text: The tool got lost in transit due to FedEx, but when it arrived, I tried it out and the first pallet kicked my butt. I have since learned tricks to employ while using this tool and I can rip a stack of pallets in under an hour. Now I have so much wood in my woodshop that I'm running out of places to store it
customer_reviews.author: BobTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little heavy but needs to be to do the job. Replacing the deck on our dock. Has saved a lot of time removing the old boards.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Ernst

product_meta.title: TUFFIOM 44-Inch Pallet Buster Tool with Extended Padded Handle & Free Nail Puller| Deluxe Industrial Pallet Breaker| Iron Pry Bar Deck Wrecker, Longer & Easier (Yellow)
feature_bullets: ✅ EASY TO USE: Smart design save your time and efforts. Of course save your back also. Maximum leverage is created to pry boards easily from floor joists. Just slide under the board, straddle a single or double joist and lift the board. Rotatable head allows working close to structure. Drastically reduces demolition time. LONGER length - 44’’ allows LESS efforts, compared with others’ industrial 41’’.
✅ ERGONOMIC HANDLE: LONGER padded anti-slip grip provides MORE COMFORT compared with others. Length of padded grip: 5.3’’.
✅ FREE NAIL PULLER INCLUDED: Multiple purpose nail remover helps remove the nails before demolishing pallets, which prevents the woods from broken. Ideal for pallet furniture projects.
✅ TOUGH: Made of premium iron frame, the pry bar is heavy duty and built for long-lasting use. Weight: 15.7lbs.
✅ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: 12-month hassle-free manufacturer's warranty; free lifetime technical support. US Local Stock and Local Shipment via FedEx/ UPS/ USPS promise instant delivery.
